abstract: Texas requests more time from United States Supreme Court to answer immigration appeal presented by Obama administration; if approved, delay would likely prevent Pres Obama's plan to shield millions of undocumented immigrants from deportation from enactment during his term.
lead_paragraph: Texas asked the United States Supreme Court on Monday for more time to answer the Obama administration’s immigration appeal, a delay that would probably prevent President Obama’s plan to shield millions of immigrants from deportation from taking effect during his presidency.

headline.main: Texas Seeks Delay on Immigration Case
headline.print_headline: Texas Seeks Delay on Immigration Case
